body_html:
I added #17652 as an effort to support built-in types for tf.as_dtype.

I think one potential issue is that python's float is implemented as C double, so there are some discrepancies here.

Not sure if this is the way to go, but will let tensorflower's to make a call.
body_text:
I added  #17652 as an effort to support built-in types for tf.as_dtype.
I think one potential issue is that python's float is implemented as C double, so there are some discrepancies here.
Not sure if this is the way to go, but will let tensorflower's to make a call.
body:
I added  #17652 as an effort to support built-in types for `tf.as_dtype`.

I think one potential issue is that python's `float` is implemented as C `double`, so there are some discrepancies here.

Not sure if this is the way to go, but will let tensorflower's to make a call.
